T02D1677:257a-1: shr'i sarba buddha sa ma yo gi mandala s'a dha na kra ma n'a ma /
T02D1677:257a-3: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1677:257a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1677:257a-5: ma 'gags rnam 'phrul ye shes chen po'i 'od //
T02D1677:257a-6: zab cing rgya che gsung dbyangs sna tshogs sgrogs //
T02D1677:257a-7: yon tan rgyan gyis chos 'phrul mdzad mthar phyin //
T02D1677:257a-8: rigs drug lha mo'i tshogs bcas rgyal gyur cig / theg chen gsang ba'i lam mchog gsal mdzad pa'i //
T02D1677:257a-9: sangs rgyas gnyis pas nges pa'i dgongs mdzad 'gro la //
T02D1677:257a-10: 'khor 'das ma spangs las grol rgyal chen po //
T02D1677:257a-11: rim bzhin brgyud pa'i dam pa rnams la 'dud //
T02D1677:257a-12: rgyud mchog sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang mdzod las ;
T02D1677:257a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i las kyi rim pa dag / legs bsdus rnam 'grel sogs kyis gsal byas kyang //
T02D1677:257a-14: phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub thabs gsal ma bstan //
T02D1677:257a-15: dam pas ma 'ongs rnams la brtser dgongs phyir //
T02D1677:257a-16: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag mdor bsdus te //
T02D1677:257a-17: rgya mtsho rgya chen bdud rtsi thigs pa'i tshul //
T02D1677:257a-18: yang dag sgrub don yan lag phyogs gcig bshad //
T02D1677:257a-19: dam pa'i gsung dang rgyud la mi bsten cing //
T02D1677:257a-20: dgos 'brel yan lag 'thad pa'i sgrub med par //
T02D1677:257a-21: rang dgar smyos tshig khva bzhin smra byed pa //
T02D1677:257a-22: gsang don smos phyir log 'dren gtso bor grags //
T02D1677:257a-23: dgongs pa'i rim pas sgrub don ma bshad kyang //
T02D1677:257a-24: tshogs pas las rgyas myur ba'i cho ga yis //
T02D1677:257a-25: brten pa'i stobs kyis dus mtshungs grol byed pa //
T02D1677:257a-26: khyad par thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bstan bshad //
T02D1677:257a-27: rgyal ba rnams kyis dgongs mdzad ji bzhin pa'i //
T02D1677:257b-0: yang dag sgrub pa'i @257b bsnyen sgrub cho ga las //
T02D1677:257b-1: dang po rten gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis //
T02D1677:257b-2: sgrub pa chen po'i las la 'jug par bya //
T02D1677:257b-3: de dag ji bzhin legs par spyod pa'i mthus //
T02D1677:257b-4: tshe 'di las dang dngos grub phun tshogs gnas //
T02D1677:257b-5: rig 'dzin gnas thob sangs rgyas sar 'gro zhing //
T02D1677:257b-6: zag med yon tan phrin las go bar ston //
T02D1677:257b-7: gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1677:257b-8: dag gis ni nges pa'i don du bshad pa'i theg
T02D1677:257b-9: pa dag kyang phyag rgya bzhi dang tshad mas bsgrubs
T02D1677:257b-10: te bla ma brgyud pa la brten par bya'o //
T02D1677:257b-11: de la dang po rten gyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1677:257b-12: zhi zhing des la gsong por smra ba dang //
T02D1677:257b-13: sgyu sogs med pas gzhan don brtson pa dang //
T02D1677:257b-14: nga rgyal khro gtum dang bral zhing //
T02D1677:257b-16: dam pa'i bshes gnyen la brten te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D1677:257b-17: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1677:257b-18: sdom pa blang pa dag bya'o //
T02D1677:257b-19: de nas theg pa chen po la mos pa'i thugs kyis dad pa dang //
T02D1677:257b-21: yang dag pa'i lta bas shes rab gsum bskyed cing
T02D1677:257b-22: snod kyi dri ma dag bsal bar byas nas rdo
T02D1677:257b-23: rje theg pa la mos pas de nyid kyi bla
T02D1677:257b-24: ma dam pa la brten te dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D1677:257b-25: pa dang / dbang bzhi rim pa bzhin du thob par bya ba dang //
T02D1677:257b-26: de dag gi dam tshig ji skad bstan pa bzhin
T02D1677:257b-27: du gnas pas 'gro ba thams cad bsgral zhing byang
T02D1677:257b-28: chub kyi lam la dgod par bya ba'i phyir rdo
T02D1677:257b-29: rje theg pa las bshad pa'i don bzhin du bdag
T02D1677:257b-31: dad pa la skyo dub med pa dang /
T02D1677:257b-32: brtson 'grus la thang lhod med pa dang /
T02D1677:257b-33: lta ba la dbye gsal med pa dang /
T02D1677:257b-34: spyod pa la 'gron theb med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te /
T02D1677:257b-35: bsgrub pa rim pa'i gdams ngag mnos shing lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D1677:257b-38: sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dag the tshom med par nyams su blang ngo //
T02D1677:257b-39: des bdag dang gzhan dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir
T02D1677:257b-40: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga dang
T02D1677:257b-41: / dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin shes shing bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1677:257b-42: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi shas pas rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D1677:257b-43: sngags rnam pa bzhis dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang /
T02D1677:257b-44: ye shes kyi lha la sogs pa rnams dgug pa dang /
T02D1677:258a-0: mchod pa gsum gyi rim pa shes pas lha @258a * //
T02D1677:258a-1: dang slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1677:258a-2: las sna tshogs kyi bya ba la sbyor ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D1677:258a-3: bdag dang gzhan la sogs ba ma lus pa rnams gang 'dod pa dag bsrung ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D1677:258a-4: slar bsdu ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D1677:258a-5: gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga rnams la mkhas shing
T02D1677:258a-6: byang bar byas nas bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu bca'
T02D1677:258a-8: de yang rdo rje rgyal po dang /
T02D1677:258a-9: rgyal theb kyi ma zin par gyur nas /
T02D1677:258a-10: gnas shar dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho
T02D1677:258a-11: bar gyur pa nags tshal phun sum tshogs par 'khor
T02D1677:258a-13: yo byad dang rgyan chas dag phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas las la sbyar ro //
T02D1677:258a-14: de la gnas ni rnal 'byor pa dag shin tu
T02D1677:258a-15: nyams dga' bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi padma 'dra ba
T02D1677:258a-16: las dbus mtho zhing nam mkha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
T02D1677:258a-18: shar dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar
T02D1677:258a-19: gyur pa nags tshal bzang po me tog dang 'bras
T02D1677:258a-21: chu rgyun gsal bas mtha' bzhi rgyas pa'i ri'am /
T02D1677:258a-22: ljongs sam thang la sogs pa rin po che dang
T02D1677:258a-23: sman 'bras kyis brgyan pa ni shin tu bkra shis
T02D1677:258a-24: par 'gyur ro // de las gzhan pa'i las phra
T02D1677:258a-25: mo dag sgrub pa la ni rigs so so'i gnas
T02D1677:258a-27: der shis pa dang mi shis pa'i ltas brtag pa'i
T02D1677:258a-28: phyir sa pus nub tsam du brkos la slar sa
T02D1677:258a-29: des dgong ba'am dri chu bzang po dang sbyar bas
T02D1677:258a-30: bkang ste / mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje dril
T02D1677:258a-31: bu gzung zhing rang gi sngags brjod nas mi drag
T02D1677:258a-32: par gom pa brgya'i gnas nas log ste blta bar
T02D1677:258a-33: bkang ste / bya'o // de las ma legs pa'i
T02D1677:258a-34: mtshan ma mthong ba dag la ni g-yas g-yon gyi
T02D1677:258a-35: gnas su spo bar bya zhing /
T02D1677:258a-36: pra se na la sog pas brtag go //
T02D1677:258a-37: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis snod dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1677:258a-38: sku'i rten gzugs pa dang gsung gi sgra bsgrags pa dang /
T02D1677:258a-39: mchod sbyin chen po rgya cher gtang zhing /
T02D1677:258a-40: gtor ma'i tshogs kyis mgron rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02D1677:258a-41: de nas yang rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya'am /
T02D1677:258a-42: ye shes kyi phyag rgyas kyang brtags nas shin tu dge bar gyur ba der sa bslang bar bya'o //
T02D1677:258a-43: gal te mtshan ma ngan pa lta bu zhig na
T02D1677:258a-44: ni zhi ba dang drag pos gdul bar bya zhing
T02D1677:258a-45: de dag gi sbyin sreg la sogs pas 'grub par
T02D1677:258b-0: 'gyur ro // @258b yul gyi bdag po rgyal po la sogs pa dag la ni bslang ba'am /
T02D1677:258b-2: mi snang ba la ni rang gi lha'i sbyor bas gtor ma btang ste /
T02D1677:258b-3: mgron rnams tshim nas las la bsgo zhing de las khyad par du sa'i lha mo dang /
T02D1677:258b-4: sa bdag ta pa la'i 'khor rnams la bslangs nas de dag mnyes par bya'o//
T02D1677:258b-5: de nas sa gzhi de dag tu dri chab byin gyis brlabs pa sngags kyis gtor zhing /
T02D1677:258b-6: ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1677:258b-7: yi ge gsum gyis spyang pa byas nas dkyil 'khor ji tsam 'dod pa'i rgyar sa gzhi brkos te /
T02D1677:258b-8: dngos grub rab 'bring gi don du //
T02D1677:258b-11: sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du brkos pa'i tshad 'phang du brtsig par bya'o //
T02D1677:258b-12: de'i dus su rus pa dang /
T02D1677:258b-16: sa ro rnams bsal te dri zhim pa'i chu dang /
T02D1677:258b-17: sa mnyen 'jam pa sbyin po dang bsres nas brtsigs te /
T02D1677:258b-20: dri rnams snying po ru gzhug go //
T02D1677:258b-21: yang chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i don bsam zhing /
T02D1677:258b-22: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shudhonyaham zhes brjod de /
T02D1677:258b-24: de nas mchod gtor sna tshogs nye bar spyang zhing //
T02D1677:258b-25: rigs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa lngas rang nyid rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02D1677:258b-26: sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i don du /
T02D1677:258b-28: zhes brjod cing nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin las
T02D1677:258b-29: 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ri rab dang bcas pa
T02D1677:258b-33: gur la me 'od dang bcas par bsam mo //
T02D1677:258b-34: de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa la phyogs bzhi /
T02D1677:258b-35: de'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni /
T02D1677:258b-36: sna tshogs rdo rje bcings pa sa la bzhag ste /
T02D1677:258b-37: aom me de ni badzri bhya ba badzra bandha h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1677:258b-38: de nas bdag nyid kyi mdun du sa'i lha mo
T02D1677:258b-39: sku mdog ser mo bum pa 'dzin pa bka' nyan
T02D1677:258b-40: pa'i tshul du gnas pa las zhal bsil dang mchod
T02D1677:258b-41: yon phul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1677:258b-42: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1677:258b-43: spyod pa'i chul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D1677:258b-44: sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02D1677:258b-45: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1677:258b-46: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D1677:258b-47: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02D1677:258b-48: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02D1677:259a-2: zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab nas //
T02D1677:259a-3: ji srid las ma grub pa'i bar du bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02D1677:259a-4: lha mo dgyes nas mdangs phyung ste slar smras pa /
T02D1677:259a-5: khyed rnams dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par gyis shig ces brjod bar bsam mo //
T02D1677:259a-6: de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
T02D1677:259a-7: gnas pa la phyogs bzhi'i rnal 'byor ba rgyan gyis
T02D1677:259a-8: brgyan zhing / lha mo bzhi'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1677:259a-9: aom byams chen nam mkha'i rigs sbyor ba /
T02D1677:259a-11: rnam 'byed gsal ba'i chos mchog can //
T02D1677:259a-12: yang dag ye shes spyod pa grol //
T02D1677:259a-13: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1677:259a-14: aom snying rje'i gnas mchog dag pa'i dngos //
T02D1677:259a-15: mnyam nyid chos kun 'byung ba yi //
T02D1677:259a-16: yon tan rin chen mdzod ston pa'i //
T02D1677:259a-17: rnam 'phrul chos las rab tu grol //
T02D1677:259a-18: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1677:259a-19: aom dga' ba'i padmo mtshan ldan pa //
T02D1677:259a-20: kun rtog dngos gsal chags pa med //
T02D1677:259a-21: rdo rje gsang gsum gnas gdon pa'i //
T02D1677:259a-23: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1677:259a-24: aom btang snyoms gnas ngan dra ba sel //
T02D1677:259a-25: phrin las bdag po stobs rdzogs pa //
T02D1677:259a-26: bya ba'i ye shes mthar mdzad cing //
T02D1677:259a-27: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol //
T02D1677:259a-28: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1677:259a-29: aom sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1677:259a-31: sdig pa thams cad las grol zhing //
T02D1677:259a-32: bsod nams dngos grub kun 'byung ba'i //
T02D1677:259a-33: rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog / mthong dga' mthong bas grol byed pa //
T02D1677:259a-34: lam mchog gsang ba chen po'i tshogs //
T02D1677:259a-35: bdag nyid chen pos bstan du gsol //
T02D1677:259a-36: aa la la la la ho //
T02D1677:259a-38: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
T02D1677:259a-39: 'dzin las khro bo rta mchog rol pa'i skur bsgom
T02D1677:259a-40: zhing phyogs bcur bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
T02D1677:259a-41: mig g-yas par ma las byung ba'i nyi ma'i mes thams cad bsreg pa dang /
T02D1677:259a-42: mig g-yon par aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i chus dag pa dang /
T02D1677:259a-43: sna'i rtse mor yam las byung ba'i rlung gis thams
T02D1677:259b-0: cad 'thor zhing phyag gis @259b mtshon cha khrol nas
T02D1677:259b-3: h'um lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang //
T02D1677:259b-4: dri za srin po sha za'i tshogs //
T02D1677:259b-5: gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro gdug / gnod byed drag po ma lus rnams //
T02D1677:259b-6: gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa //
T02D1677:259b-7: srung byed pa yi bdag po'i bka' ;
T02D1677:259b-8: / thos pa tsam gyis myur du dengs //
T02D1677:259b-9: nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed //
T02D1677:259b-10: gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che //
T02D1677:259b-11: rdo rje tho ba kha tv'am gas //
T02D1677:259b-12: thal ba'i tshogs bzhin bshig par byed //
T02D1677:259b-15: gal te gang gis dam tshig bcag /'dod gsum skyes rnams gsad bya ste /
T02D1677:259b-17: zhes lan gsum brjod cing sa gzhi bskor te phyogs skyong bcu dag gnas lngar bsdus te /
T02D1677:259b-18: khro bo stobs po che dang sbrin sgra la sogs pa'i phur bus gdab bo //
T02D1677:259b-19: aom badzra gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D1677:259b-21: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02D1677:259b-23: h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1677:259b-24: k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1677:259b-27: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1677:259b-28: de nas dpal he ru kar bsgom zhing mkha' 'gro
T02D1677:259b-29: ma brgyad dang bcas pa'i stong stabs kyis thams cad
T02D1677:259b-30: bsrung bar bya'o // de nas las kyi rdo rje
T02D1677:259b-31: phyi rol gyis tegs bu la mchod gtor bshams te
T02D1677:259b-32: bsrung bar bya'o // // dkon mchog gsum dbang por bzhag nas /
T02D1677:259b-34: brgya byin la sogs pa'i srung ma rnams dgug cing mchod pa dang /
T02D1677:259b-35: 'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i lha srin sde brgyad la cha gcig dbul ba dang /
T02D1677:259b-36: lan chags kyi bgegs rigs rnams la gtor ma bsngos
T02D1677:259b-37: nas khyad par gyi gtor ma bzhi rgyal po sde
T02D1677:259b-38: bzhi la dbul zhing rten la gzhag ste /
T02D1677:259b-39: mnga' gsol zhes phyi mtshams bcad do //
T02D1677:259b-40: de nas stegs bu tshad dang ldan pa legs par brtsigs te /
T02D1677:259b-41: phyogs bzhir sbyin sreg gi thab khung bzhi dang /
T02D1677:259b-42: mtshams su rta mchog lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1677:260a-0: de nas legs par brtsigs shing byugs nas ba'i rnam pa @260a * //
T02D1677:260a-3: sman rnams bsres te byug cing /
T02D1677:260a-4: de'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga'i chu byin gyis brlabs pas byug go //
T02D1677:260a-5: de nas lha rnams kyi gnas su rig pas thig
T02D1677:260a-6: gdab cing bdud rtsi lngas dbus su thig le gru
T02D1677:260a-7: bzhi pa lha mo nyi shu'i gnas su zlum por
T02D1677:260a-8: byas la / de la lha so so'i sngags kyis me tog dgram par bya'o //
T02D1677:260a-9: de'i rjes su mchod pa'i tshogs dgram zhing /
T02D1677:260a-15: brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1677:260a-16: dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas nas ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D1677:260a-18: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pas mnyes par byas nas bstod cing gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D1677:260a-19: de yang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
T02D1677:260a-21: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing tshig 'di brjod do //
T02D1677:260a-22: thugs rje chen po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1677:260a-23: ma lus sems can don mdzad pa'i //
T02D1677:260a-24: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sras dang bcas //
T02D1677:260a-25: stobs mchog rgyal chen rnams la bstod //
T02D1677:260a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1677:260a-28: mgon gyur las rnams grub pa'i phyir //
T02D1677:260a-29: rdo rje gsang ba bdag gis bri //
T02D1677:260a-30: brtse bas slob ma rnams phyir dang //
T02D1677:260a-31: bdag nyid rnams la mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1677:260a-32: bcom ldan khyed la bdag gus te //
T02D1677:260a-33: dgyes mdzad 'os par gyur pa lags //
T02D1677:260a-34: bdag cag rnams la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1677:260a-35: bya ba chen po 'khor lo'i phyir //
T02D1677:260a-36: 'bras gnas byang chub sems sogs dang //
T02D1677:260a-37: gsang sngags gsang ba'i lha nyid dang //
T02D1677:260a-39: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rjes dga' ba //

T02D1677:260a-42: don grub gsang ba bdag gis brtsam //
T02D1677:260a-43: rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te //
T02D1677:260a-44: gnang bar mdzad pa'i 'os lags so //
T02D1677:260b-0: zhes lan gsum gsol ba @260b btab nas /

T02D1677:264a-8: gzugs brnyan bri la sogs pa la //

T02D1677:264a-17: 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig / stobs chen dpal ldan he ru ka'i //

T02D1677:264a-23: bdud dang srin po 'khor bcas kun //
T02D1677:264a-24: bcom zhing gsang ba'i gnyen po ni //
T02D1677:264a-25: bde gshegs thugs kyi dngos grub mchog / srid gsum thal byed rngam pa des //

T02D1677:264a-27: bdud dang srin po 'khor bcas dang //
T02D1677:264a-28: gshin rje bcom zhing bsad nas ni //

T02D1677:264a-32: mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan //
T02D1677:264a-33: rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan //
T02D1677:264a-34: lag pa g-yas g-yon mtshams su bstan //
T02D1677:264a-36: aom sarba p'a bam ka ra te ta ba bi shva ma ta ka ru dra h'um phat /
T02D1677:264a-37: aom sarba p'a pa ka ra he ta pa bi shva ka tv'am ga ru dra h'um phat /
T02D1677:264a-38: aom sarba p'a pam ka ra he ta pa bi shva a'a k'arsha ru dra h'um phat /
T02D1677:264a-39: gnas kyi sgo ni su yis bcad //
T02D1677:264a-40: sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci //
T02D1677:264a-41: gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba las //
T02D1677:264a-42: yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye //
T02D1677:264a-43: de nas g-yas su bskor te /
T02D1677:264a-44: lte ba'i phyogs su ae gru gsum gyi sgo phye
T02D1677:264a-45: nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas rnam par shes pa drangs
T02D1677:264a-46: te / aom ma h'a tso sha phyung zhes gnas
T02D1677:264b-0: gsum gyi zhing khams gang rung @264b du rigs lhun
T02D1677:264b-1: gyis grub pa'i sras su bya'o //

T02D1677:264b-3: rnal 'byor pa rnams nang du bzhugs nas /
T02D1677:264b-4: nang khrol gyi tshogs rnams dug gsum rnam par dag
T02D1677:264b-5: pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis mchod par dmigs shing
T02D1677:264b-6: / dga' ba'i glu gar dang rol mos mchod par bya'o //
T02D1677:264b-7: de nas lha thams cad la bstod cing bskul ba'i phyir rdo rje'i glu blang ste /
T02D1677:264b-8: kha tv'am ga la rgyab rten bcas //
T02D1677:264b-9: nam mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1677:264b-10: nam mkha' kun las grol ba 'grub //
T02D1677:264b-11: dngos po thams cad mkha' byin pa //
T02D1677:264b-12: mkha' las sgyu ma kun blangs nas //
T02D1677:264b-13: lus pa med par der za'o //
T02D1677:264b-16: ghande'i sgra yis sgrol bar mdzad //
T02D1677:264b-17: la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin //
T02D1677:264b-18: la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi //
T02D1677:264b-19: la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi //
T02D1677:264b-20: la lar gshin rje bzhin du rngam //
T02D1677:264b-21: la lar dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //

T02D1677:264b-23: mi sdug rigs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i //
T02D1677:264b-25: ma lus lus pa med par sgrol //
T02D1677:264b-27: gzhan yang sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs rnams za byed
T02D1677:264b-28: kyi tshogs dang 'jigs byed kyi zhal du dbul ba
T02D1677:264b-29: ni // bstabs su gsol gcig he ru ka //
T02D1677:264b-30: gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di //
T02D1677:264b-31: phra man gshed ma khyed rnams kyis //
T02D1677:264b-32: dbang dang rig sngags byin brlabs te //
T02D1677:264b-33: rig sngags kyis ni rmongs mdzad nas //

T02D1677:264b-35: 'di la sogs pa rnams la yang //

T02D1677:264b-37: sha dang rkang khrag 'dod ba rnams //
T02D1677:264b-38: rig sngags kyis ni byin brlabs nas //

T02D1677:264b-48: 'jigs byed drag shul chen po yis //
T02D1677:264b-49: khams gsum cig car bsgral nas kyang //

T02D1677:265a-4: 'jigs byed khyed lngas kun za na //
T02D1677:265a-5: dngos por gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun //
T02D1677:265a-6: ngas bstabs khyed kyis yul la bzhes //

T02D1677:265a-8: ha ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo kh'a hi kh'a
T02D1677:265a-9: hi / shar phyogs 'jig rten lam sgo na //

T02D1677:265a-11: 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can //
T02D1677:265a-12: khyod ni sgrib pa kun la bsgribs //
T02D1677:265a-13: yang dag thar lam ye shes kyi //
T02D1677:265a-14: khungs brtag rtsad bcad bdag las byung //
T02D1677:265a-15: bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa rnams //

T02D1677:265a-19: rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jigs //
T02D1677:265a-20: srid pa ji bzhin yong ye stong pa ste ;

T02D1677:265a-22: 'dod pa'i khams stong pa nyid do //
T02D1677:265a-23: gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid do //
T02D1677:265a-24: gzugs med pa'i khams stong pa nyid do //

T02D1677:265a-30: de phyir dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D1677:265a-31: 'jigs pas stong nyid shes par bya //
T02D1677:265a-32: chen po stong pa zhes bya ba //
T02D1677:265a-33: kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o //

T02D1677:265a-35: stong nyid rjes su dran par bya //
T02D1677:265a-36: aom dharma dh'a tu badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas /

T02D1677:265a-39: rang rang gi gnas su me mar dang bcas pas dgram pa dang /

T02D1677:265a-41: shar du rkang pa g-yas pa'o //
T02D1677:265a-42: nub tu lag pa g-yon pa'o //
T02D1677:265a-43: byang du rkang pa g-yon pa'o //
T02D1677:265a-46: nub byang du dku g-yon pa'o //

T02D1677:265b-2: zhing skyong la sogs pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02D1677:265b-3: gzhan yang dbang sgyur chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las

T02D1677:265b-5: // rnal 'byor pa thams cad rang gi lhar bsgom pa dang //
T02D1677:265b-6: sgrub rdzas thams cad yi ge gsum gyis bsregs shing sbyangs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang /

T02D1677:265b-10: dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rdzogs par
T02D1677:265b-11: byas nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi so so'i gnas
T02D1677:265b-13: de dag gis ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngon
T02D1677:265b-14: du 'gro ba'i yan lag gi cho ga bstan pa

T02D1677:265b-16: pa'i phyir phyag rgya lngas mtshan cing chos gos lnga
T02D1677:265b-17: yin no // bgos te / 'gro ba'i don du
T02D1677:265b-18: dam bcas nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1677:265b-19: yin no // bgos te / la dmigs te / gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1677:265b-22: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1677:265b-23: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1677:265b-24: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1677:265b-26: thun mong gi bzlas brjod dang /
T02D1677:265b-27: khyad par gyi bzlas brjod dang /
T02D1677:265b-28: de dag rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod pa byas la /
T02D1677:265b-29: lha rnams la thugs dam bskul bar bya //
T02D1677:265b-30: gal te rnal 'byor ba mtshan ma thob pa zhig gis 'jug na ni thig le 'am /
T02D1677:265b-32: rnam par dag pa spyad par bya'o //
T02D1677:265b-33: de nas tshogs kyi cho ga dang /
T02D1677:265b-35: lhag ma'i las dag pa'i bsgom pa dang /
T02D1677:265b-36: cho ga rdzogs pa'i las la sbyar ro //
T02D1677:265b-37: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir gong du dkyil 'khor
T02D1677:265b-38: du 'jug pa tsam las ma byas pa dag la
T02D1677:265b-39: ni snga ma bzhin dus su bar mtshams su gzhag
T02D1677:265b-40: nas rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1677:265b-41: de bzhin du gang thob pa nas brtsams te /
T02D1677:265b-42: rdzogs pa'i bar du spyang bar bya'o //
T02D1677:265b-43: de dag gi rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02D1677:265b-44: dang po gong rol du 'jug pa'i cho ga la /
T02D1677:266a-2: / rgyal theb cho ga rdzogs pas slob ma yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
T02D1677:266a-3: bar khang gi sgo mtshams su mandala bshams pa la bzhag ste /
T02D1677:266a-4: byang gi sgo drung na gnas pa'i bum pas bsangs nas /
T02D1677:266a-5: rigs kyi lha mchod cing gsol ba btab nas shis par bya'o //
T02D1677:266a-7: dkar po ser po dag la /
T02D1677:266a-8: aa kham b'i ra h'um h'um /
T02D1677:266a-9: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas gdong g-yogs te /
T02D1677:266a-10: rin po che'i phreng ba thogs nas theg pa chen
T02D1677:266a-11: por mos shing sems bskyed pas gnas pa la slob
T02D1677:266a-13: kye khyod ci la dga' bas 'dir 'jug pa yin zhes pa dang /
T02D1677:266a-14: slob mas kyang bdag skal ba bzang po la dga' bas 'jug pa'o zhes so //
T02D1677:266a-15: slar brjod pa de khyod la ci dgos zhes so //
T02D1677:266a-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T02D1677:266a-19: bde gshegs sras bcas dam tshig pas //
T02D1677:266a-20: yon dbul thugs rjes bdag la dgongs //
T02D1677:266a-21: sangs rgyas sku gsung rang bzhin mchog / slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1677:266a-22: skal bzang lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i //
T02D1677:266a-24: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1677:266a-25: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1677:266a-28: rgyal ba kun gyi gnas bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1677:266a-29: dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' ba //
T02D1677:266a-30: snying po'i grong khyer chen po 'dir //
T02D1677:266a-31: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02D1677:266a-33: de nas las kyi rdo rjes lag pa g-yas pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1677:266a-34: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da ya mi h'um /
T02D1677:266a-35: zhes brjod cing yol ba'i nang du gzhug ste /
T02D1677:266a-36: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag la 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1677:266a-37: aom thog ma med dus 'khor ba'i gnas //
T02D1677:266a-38: bdag gis bsags pa'i las gang gis //
T02D1677:266a-39: bgyid stsal yi rang dus 'dir bshags //
T02D1677:266a-40: phyin chad mi bgyid sdom pa gzung //
T02D1677:266a-41: rgyal ba sras sogs dge rtsa bzhi //
T02D1677:266a-42: 'gro gzhan legs byas gang yin pa //
T02D1677:266a-43: de dag kun la rjes yi rang //
T02D1677:266a-44: byang chub chen por bdag gis bsngo //
T02D1677:266a-45: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D1677:266b-0: bdag gis dus 'dir @266b skyabs su gsol //
T02D1677:266b-1: nyon mongs sdug bsngal bcad pa dang //
T02D1677:266b-2: dge ba'i tshogs mang spel ba'i phyir //
T02D1677:266b-3: byang chub bde chen don bskyed nas //
T02D1677:266b-4: 'gro rnams di ring don du gnyer //
T02D1677:266b-5: sangs rgyas gyur nas bdag gis ni //
T02D1677:266b-6: 'gro rnams srid pa'i gnas nas gnon //
T02D1677:266b-8: de nas rdo rje me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa slob ma'i snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D1677:266b-9: aom bde gshegs kun gyis khyod nyid ni //
T02D1677:266b-10: de ring byin gyis brlabs pa na //
T02D1677:266b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen 'di //
T02D1677:266b-12: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing //
T02D1677:266b-13: dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la //
T02D1677:266b-14: nams kyang smra bar bya ba min //
T02D1677:266b-15: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02D1677:266b-16: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D1677:266b-17: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad de //
T02D1677:266b-18: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1677:266b-19: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1677:266b-20: aom ma h'a sa ma ya au da ka tha /
T02D1677:266b-21: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1677:266b-22: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1677:266b-23: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni //
T02D1677:266b-25: aom a'a:h'um sarba panytsa aa mri ta h'um /
T02D1677:266b-26: badzra au da ka ta hri tha /
T02D1677:266b-27: de ring phyin chad khyod nyid kyi //
T02D1677:266b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin pas //
T02D1677:266b-29: gang zhig bsgo ba'i las rnams byos //
T02D1677:266b-30: de la brnyas par ma byed cig / gal te cung zhig brnyas byas na //
T02D1677:266b-31: dus min 'chi zhing dmyal bar ltung //
T02D1677:266b-32: rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes thugs //
T02D1677:266b-33: sku dang gsung 'phrul las mdzad pa //
T02D1677:266b-34: phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis //
T02D1677:266b-35: di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol //
T02D1677:266b-37: slob ma'i snying gar bde gshegs bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1677:266b-38: bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02D1677:266b-39: dngos grub sbyin zhing dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o //
T02D1677:266b-43: spyi bo rnams su 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1677:266b-46: zhes pas bsrung zhing rdo rje dril bu dkrol te /
T02D1677:266b-47: aom dzny'a na a'a be sha ya stam bha ya
T02D1677:266b-48: ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya
T02D1677:266b-49: h'um a'a ha dzhee:/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do //
T02D1677:266b-50: nam zhig ye shes babs pa'i tshe ni sku dang /
T02D1677:267a-2: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bden pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1677:267a-4: slob ma'i mchog 'di gzhug par bgyi //
T02D1677:267a-5: rigs kyi lha yi bye brag dang //

T02D1677:267a-7: dngos grub mtshan pa dag / snying po'i gnas 'dir
T02D1677:267a-8: legs par ston // zhes brjod cing kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la brtags te /

T02D1677:267a-17: yang phreng ba de blangs te slob ma'i mgo la bcings nas /
T02D1677:267a-18: kye sems dpa' chen po phreng ba 'di dang mi

T02D1677:267a-25: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02D1677:267a-26: aom badzra tsakshu dzny'a na pra be sha phat /

T02D1677:267a-33: de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi lha //

T02D1677:267a-36: pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis lha dang slob dpon dang
T02D1677:267a-37: / rnal 'byor pa dag myos par byas nas /

T02D1677:267a-40: brjod par bya'o // der slar brjod pa /

T02D1677:270a-25: da ni lung bstan pa las /
T02D1677:270a-26: dang po slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ni /
T02D1677:270a-27: 'di ltar nga yis khyod lung bstan //
T02D1677:270a-28: rdo rje dpal ldan gsang ba'i bdag / dngos po mchog tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1677:270a-29: srid pa'i ngan 'gro gnas las grol //
T02D1677:270a-30: kye che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02D1677:270a-32: de'i rjes la dus gsum gya rgyal ba rnams kyis
T02D1677:270a-33: kyang phyogs bcu nas gsung dbyangs mthun pa'i sgra skad
T02D1677:270a-34: kyis lung bstan par mdzad de /
T02D1677:270a-35: kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyi srid pa tha ma ni 'di yin te /
T02D1677:270a-36: gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa la zhugs pas phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D1677:270a-37: gsang sngags kyi mthus rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1677:270a-38: khyod kyis chags pa rnams pa gnyis dang 'bral bar mi bya ste /
T02D1677:270a-39: de dag gi las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1677:270b-0: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan @270b de ;
T02D1677:270b-1: / de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02D1677:270b-2: khyod kyis nam yang bya ba min //
T02D1677:270b-3: ma h'a sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02D1677:270b-4: de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon dang //
T02D1677:270b-6: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1677:270b-7: lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs//
T02D1677:270b-8: sems can kun la rjes brtse bar //
T02D1677:270b-9: dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris //
T02D1677:270b-10: rtsi gcig nan tan bskyed nas ni //
T02D1677:270b-11: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor //
T02D1677:270b-14: da ni dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
T02D1677:270b-15: dang po dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phan yon brjod par bya'o //
T02D1677:270b-17: zhugs shing mthong ba la sogs pas //
T02D1677:270b-18: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02D1677:270b-19: khyed rnams rab tu dge bar gnas //
T02D1677:270b-21: de nas don bzhin du spyad pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1677:270b-23: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02D1677:270b-24: phyi nas 'chi ba yang med cing //
T02D1677:270b-25: mtshungs med thub par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1677:270b-26: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D1677:270b-27: srid pa shin tu dag pa nas //
T02D1677:270b-28: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so //
T02D1677:270b-29: da ni de dag gi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02D1677:270b-30: byang chub sems ni yongs mi spang //
T02D1677:270b-31: rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya che //
T02D1677:270b-32: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1677:270b-33: sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med //
T02D1677:270b-34: dam pa'i chos dag mi smad cing //
T02D1677:270b-35: ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya //
T02D1677:270b-36: mi shes snod min rmongs pa la //
T02D1677:270b-37: nam yang bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D1677:270b-38: rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste //
T02D1677:270b-39: slob dpon dag la gus par gyis //
T02D1677:270b-40: zhes pa'i don bstan par bya'o //
T02D1677:270b-41: de ltar slob dpon gyi dbang thob pa'i phan yon ni /
T02D1677:270b-42: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che //
T02D1677:270b-43: bdag po rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing //
T02D1677:270b-44: bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bar //
T02D1677:270b-45: grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin //
T02D1677:270b-47: sangs rgyas thob par the tshom med //
T02D1677:270b-48: dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas //
T02D1677:270b-49: slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur //
T02D1677:270b-50: slob dpon bro gros dam tshig ldan //
T02D1677:270b-51: brtan g-yo'i mtha' las rnam par grol //
T02D1677:271a-2: / ngan pa'i gnas ngan kun spangs pa'o //
T02D1677:271a-4: de nas gdams ngag bstan pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1677:271a-5: de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid
T02D1677:271a-7: de la dang po dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ni gru bzhi par gnas pas /
T02D1677:271a-8: che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par byas zhing sgo rnam pa bzhi yis byams pa dang /
T02D1677:271a-11: btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1677:271a-12: rta babs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du ni
T02D1677:271a-13: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul du gnas pa
T02D1677:271a-14: ni byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
T02D1677:271a-15: bar du bgrod nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhir
T02D1677:271a-17: rin po che sna lnga'i rtsig pa las 'od kha
T02D1677:271a-18: dog nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa 'phro ba
T02D1677:271a-19: ni / rang bzhin ye shes drug gi byin rlabs
T02D1677:271a-20: las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs su snang ba'i
T02D1677:271a-21: ni / rang bzhin no // rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D1677:271a-22: ka ba brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi
T02D1677:271a-23: ni / rang bzhin no // rang bzhin la / rdo rje theg pa'i tshul gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1677:271a-26: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa ni mdzad pa
T02D1677:271a-27: rgya chen po'i phrin las rnams yon tan las byung
T02D1677:271a-28: ba'i tshul lo // 'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi lha mo ni ;
T02D1677:271a-29: ; yul drug rnam par dag pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1677:271a-30: gdugs snying rje chen po'i char khab dang /
T02D1677:271a-31: rgyal mtshan bdud rnam bzhi las rgyal zhing thog pa'i mchog ston pa'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D1677:271a-32: bla re mnyam pa nyid du tshul gcig par spyod pa'i tshul //
T02D1677:271a-33: rnga yab rnam par rtog pa'i sbrang ma sel bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D1677:271a-34: zla ba phyed pa rdo rjes smon lam rgya chen
T02D1677:271a-35: po 'gro ba'i don du theg pa chen po'i sngags
T02D1677:271a-36: kyi sgo nas don mdzad pa dang /
T02D1677:271a-37: rdo rje rin po che dbyig pa la ba dan
T02D1677:271a-38: dbyangs pas mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'i
T02D1677:271a-40: de la dril bu sgra snyan pa phyogs bcur sgrogs
T02D1677:271a-41: pa ni theg pa sna tshogs kyi don ston pa'o
T02D1677:271a-42: // re'u cha brgyad kyi mtshan ma ni sku'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D1677:271a-44: thugs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1677:271a-45: thig bzhis legs par phye ba ni //
T02D1677:271b-1: sna tshogs padma'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D1677:271b-2: mu khyud rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba ni chags
T02D1677:271b-3: pa med pa'i phrin las kun du don spyad kyang
T02D1677:271b-4: nyon mongs pa'i mtshan mas ma gos shing bde ba
T02D1677:271b-5: chen po'i dbyings las sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa
T02D1677:271b-7: bum pa rgyan gyis mdzes shing bdud rtsi'i bcud dang
T02D1677:271b-8: ldan pas che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung
T02D1677:271b-9: gnas 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi ye shes rnam
T02D1677:271b-10: pa lnga'i don las yon tan gyi snang ba ma
T02D1677:271b-11: 'gags shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs su 'phro
T02D1677:271b-12: ba'o // bar du re'u mig 'khor lo'i tshul du
T02D1677:271b-13: gnas pa ni phrin las dang mchod pa'i gnas su
T02D1677:271b-14: 'gyur cing rang gi phyag rgya mdzes par gyur pa'o
T02D1677:271b-15: ba'o // // phyi rol padma la sogs pa'i phreng
T02D1677:271b-16: ba dag ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1677:271b-17: yon tan gyi snang bston pa dang /
T02D1677:271b-18: sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las dang bcas pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1677:271b-19: ye shes kyi byin rlabs kyis mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad sel bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1677:271b-20: phyi rol gyi dur khrod chen po dag gis ni
T02D1677:271b-21: thams cad gsang sngags kyi theg par 'du zhing theg
T02D1677:271b-22: pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul du
T02D1677:271b-23: khams gsum gyi zhen rtog spyang ba dang /
T02D1677:271b-24: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dag rnam par dag pa'i ngo bor bstan pa'o //
T02D1677:271b-25: zhing dang zhing skyong dag gis yon tan ma 'gags
T02D1677:271b-26: pa'i rten la sangs rgyas brgyad kyi snang ba ston
T02D1677:271b-27: pa'o // mtsho dang klu brgyad ni srid pa'i gnas
T02D1677:271b-28: kyi rtog pa'i tshogs dag gnyis su med pa'i byang
T02D1677:271b-29: chub kyi sems kyi don ston pa'o //
T02D1677:271b-30: rnal 'byor pho mo dag gis ni dbyings dang ye
T02D1677:271b-31: shes zung du 'brel pa'i don gyis chos thams cad
T02D1677:271b-33: sbrin dang mchod rten la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag
T02D1677:271b-34: gis ni thugs rje chen po'i sbrul pa'i 'phro 'du
T02D1677:271b-35: dang ye shes kyi snang ba brgyad bstan pa'o //
T02D1677:271b-36: bya khyi dang mkha' 'gro la sogs pa sna tshogs pas ni thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa dang /
T02D1677:271b-37: yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa'i phrin las gyi tshogs rnam par 'phro ba bstan pa yin no //
T02D1677:271b-38: de ltar rten gyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bstan nas
T02D1677:271b-39: brten pa'i rang bzhin dag shes par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1677:272a-1: dpa' dkar dmar gyi mdangs dang ldan pas byang chub
T02D1677:272a-2: kyi sems kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa'i mtshan mas
T02D1677:272a-3: ma gos shing thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i las
T02D1677:272a-4: mdzad pa'o // rin po che'i kha dog sna lnga'i
T02D1677:272a-5: 'od zer mdzes pas brgyan pa ni ye shes rnam
T02D1677:272a-6: pa lnga'i snang ba las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna
T02D1677:272a-7: mdzad pa'o // tshogs ston pa'o // zhal bzhi dang /
T02D1677:272a-8: phyag bzhi'i rnam pa can du byung bas phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1677:272a-9: tshad med bdag gi sgo nas 'gro ba dbugs 'byin pa'o //
T02D1677:272a-10: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum las rgyal zhing /
T02D1677:272a-11: rang gi cha lugs bcom par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1677:272a-12: phyag bzhi'i mtshon cha dag gis ye shes rnam pa
T02D1677:272a-13: lnga'i che ba las rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor snang bar
T02D1677:272a-14: mdzad pa dang / thugs rje chen pos rtse gcig tu /
T02D1677:272a-15: sems kyi las la dgongs pa dang /
T02D1677:272a-16: sku gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas khams gsum las rgyal te ;
T02D1677:272a-17: gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul ston pa dang /
T02D1677:272a-18: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa'i las kyis bskul ba dang /
T02D1677:272a-19: de'i mtshan nyid gzhan la ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1677:272a-20: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad
T02D1677:272a-21: bzang po brgyad cu dag gzhan las khyad par du
T02D1677:272a-22: 'phags pa'i tshul gyis mdzes shing byang chub sems kyi
T02D1677:272a-23: mchog tu gyur pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa
T02D1677:272a-24: dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas stod g-yogs dang mdzad
T02D1677:272a-25: pa sna tshogs kyi las mnga' bas smad g-yogs kyis
T02D1677:272a-26: brgyan pa'o // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
T02D1677:272a-27: tshad med pa bzhi'i phrin las dag la spyod pas dpung pa rin po ches mdzes pa'o //
T02D1677:272a-28: gzhan yang rin po che'i ske rags dang /
T02D1677:272a-30: do shal gyis dge ba bcu dang /
T02D1677:272a-31: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02D1677:272a-32: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
T02D1677:272a-33: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi don ston par byed pa'o //
T02D1677:272a-34: phyag dang zhabs la gdu bus mdzes shing se mo do bcus mtshan pa ni bden pa bzhi dang /
T02D1677:272a-35: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T02D1677:272a-36: dge ba bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags so //
T02D1677:272a-37: dbu la rin po che'i rgyan dang /
T02D1677:272a-40: rigs kyi bdag po dag gis brgyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T02D1677:272b-0: rigs kyi @272b mtshan mas lhag par gyur pa'o //
T02D1677:272b-1: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D1677:272b-3: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa ni phyag
T02D1677:272b-4: rgya bzhi'i sgo nas de nyid kyi don bstan par
T02D1677:272b-5: mdzad pa dang / phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1677:272b-6: gzhan yang 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par dag
T02D1677:272b-7: pa'i sgo nas khyad par gyi phrin las bzhis 'gro
T02D1677:272b-8: ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi lha mo bzhi
T02D1677:272b-9: dang / skye mched la sogs pa zag pa dang
T02D1677:272b-10: bcas pa rnam par dag par mdzad cing rigs dang
T02D1677:272b-11: ye shes kyi snang ba yon tan gyi tshogs rnam
T02D1677:272b-12: par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i phrin las kyis gzhan
T02D1677:272b-13: gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir phrin las sna tshogs dang
T02D1677:272b-14: bcas par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1677:272b-15: dkyil 'khor so so'i lha rnams dag par bstan par bya'o //
T02D1677:272b-16: de ltar rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas
T02D1677:272b-17: slob dpon gyi las su bya ba ni dbang bskur
T02D1677:272b-18: ba dang / rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D1677:272b-21: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gzhan dag gi
T02D1677:272b-22: las bya ba rnams kyang rgya cher bstan par bya'o
T02D1677:272b-23: // de nas lha dang slob dpon la ci 'byor
T02D1677:272b-24: pa'i yon gyis mchod cing rjes su yi rang dbul
T02D1677:272b-25: // bar bya'o // des ni slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bstan pa yin no //
T02D1677:272b-26: da ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs su dbang rdzogs par ma byas pa dang /
T02D1677:272b-27: gang zhig rdzogs pa dag gis gnas par 'dod na
T02D1677:272b-28: dben pa'i gnas su dris legs par byugs pa'i mantal
T02D1677:272b-29: la me tog la sogs pa bkram zhing bde ba'i
T02D1677:272b-30: stan brtsegs pa la bla ma bzhugs nas /
T02D1677:272b-31: shes rab ma mtshan dang ldan pa dag phul te /
T02D1677:272b-33: ston mo la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyis dgyes par byas nas /
T02D1677:272b-34: ras kyi yol ba la sogs pas bar bcad pa'i rgyab nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1677:272b-35: dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che //
T02D1677:272b-36: bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs //
T02D1677:272b-37: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1677:272b-38: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde stsol mdzod //
T02D1677:272b-39: byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi //
T02D1677:272b-40: yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa //
T02D1677:272b-41: ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yi //
T02D1677:272b-42: mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin //
T02D1677:273a-2: sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod //
T02D1677:273a-3: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog / ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel //
T02D1677:273a-4: gang gis byang chub bla med pa //
T02D1677:273a-5: de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod //
T02D1677:273a-7: de la slar yang smras nas /
T02D1677:273a-8: bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
T02D1677:273a-9: rgyal ba kun gyi bde chen sbyin //
T02D1677:273a-10: ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis //
T02D1677:273a-11: rang gi gnas su legs par bstod //
T02D1677:273a-13: de nas phyi nang gi khrus byas te /
T02D1677:273a-14: dam tshig gi lha mo sbyangs nas sngags dang bcas
T02D1677:273a-15: pa'i yungs kar gyis bgegs bskrad cing sbyor ba dang
T02D1677:273a-16: / rjes su sbyor bas yab yum gnyis kyi sku bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1677:273a-18: byin gyis brlab pa dag rdzogs par byas nas rol pa'i brdas bskul zhing //
T02D1677:273a-19: sbro ba bskyed cing rigs kyi nga rgyal mnyam pa'i
T02D1677:273a-20: sgo nas gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i byang chub
T02D1677:273a-21: kyi sems slob ma'i lce la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1677:273a-22: ji ltar rgyal ba bde gshegs kyis //
T02D1677:273a-23: rang gi sras sogs dbang bskur bzhin //
T02D1677:273a-24: byang chub sems de dag pa'i chus //
T02D1677:273a-25: rnam rtog dri ma dag par bya //
T02D1677:273a-26: aom ma h'a bodhi tsitta sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D1677:273a-28: slob mas kyang aa ho su kha zhes brjod cing mid de /
T02D1677:273a-29: rigs kyi cha lugs gsal bar chu'i zla ba'am sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D1677:273a-30: des ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1677:273a-31: yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'dod pas rdo
T02D1677:273a-32: rje bla ma mchog tu gyur pa la gsol ba
T02D1677:273a-34: mandala dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rdo rje bla ma dang /
T02D1677:273a-35: phyag rgya mo mtshan dang ldan pa mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1677:273a-37: kye kye mgon po bde ba che //
T02D1677:273a-38: rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung //
T02D1677:273a-39: phyag rgya mi phyed rab sgrub pa //
T02D1677:273a-40: mngon sum nyams myong bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1677:273a-41: bdag nyid chen pos ji lta bar //
T02D1677:273a-42: gtso bos bdag la bka' drin mdzod //
T02D1677:273a-43: rtog pa'i dri mas bsgribs pa rnams //
T02D1677:273a-44: byang sems chu yis dag par mdzod //
T02D1677:273b-0: des kyang rigs dang mthun pa'i yum byin gyis brlabs la slob ma'i @273b lag tu gtad de /
T02D1677:273b-1: dga' ba'i gnas chen lha mo 'di //
T02D1677:273b-2: sna tshogs sgyu rtsal yid du 'ong //
T02D1677:273b-3: legs par zung shig blo gros can //
T02D1677:273b-4: dga' bde'i mchod pa rab tu gyis //
T02D1677:273b-5: thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya //
T02D1677:273b-7: de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid dang //
T02D1677:273b-8: nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste //
T02D1677:273b-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1677:273b-10: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02D1677:273b-11: blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba //
T02D1677:273b-12: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
